title: Ep. 82 - Why This Slowdown May Not Be Temporary
itunes:title: Why This Slowdown May Not Be Temporary
description: Frank discusses the latest pullback in stocks and how economists seem too optimistic about second-half growth.  Matt Badilai, editor of S&A's Resource Report is optimistic on natural gas but cautious on oil.
content:encoded: Frank discusses the latest pullback in stocks and how economists seem too optimistic about second-half growth.  Matt Badilai, editor of S&A's Resource Report is optimistic on natural gas but cautious on oil.
